channel.title: Questions about logs (virtualbox whonix gateway)
channel.description:
Hello to all :)
I love whonix so far and I'm using it since forever! I got one question about whonix gateway (with 128 mb ram). I'm using whonix gateway with another OS as workstation. I saw that virtualbox, inside the gateway VM folder, saves logs. I want to make sure that when I use Whonix Gateway every website/hidden service visited via whonix will not be remembered.
Can you help me to understand what I have to do in order to not save logs and especially make sure that the "history" of websites visited via whonix will be NOT saved?
Thank you!

item.title: Questions about logs (virtualbox whonix gateway)
item.dc:creator: JohnWillie
item.description:
Thank you for your reply

Read full topic

item.title: Questions about logs (virtualbox whonix gateway)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix doesn’t enable logs intentionally, but make sure you have read this:

Whonix

Warning

Things you should know about Whonix and Anonymity in General to stay safe.

Read full topic
